item.title: Innovation, inspiration & ideation workshops with Cork Open Coffee
item.description: “Your Country, Your Call” is pleased to announce a series of innovation, inspiration & ideation workshops designed to inspire creative thinking and help people bring their ideas to life. The workshops, which are open to the public are free of charge and one will take place in Cork as follows: **Cork: 9th April 11.00 am, National Software Centre Campus, Mahon. ** The workshop will last for about two hours and promises to be a lot of fun as well as being informative and helpful.
